channel.title: DID on 浑身蟹数
channel.description: Recent content in DID on 浑身蟹数

item.title: DID结果的显著性
item.description: 构造演示数据 library(tidyverse) # Generate dummy data ---- set.seed(42) # number of observations enroll = 5000 generate_vector <- function(N, prob1, prob2) { term <- c(rep("term1", N), rep("term2", N)) befr <- rbinom(N, size = 1, prob = prob1) aftr <- rbinom(N, size = 1, prob = prob2) # return data.frame(term = term, renewal = c(befr, aftr)) } grpA <- generate_vector(enroll, .10, .11) grpB <- generate_vector(enroll, .11, .13) # working data frame df <- bind_rows(grpA, grpB, .
